verses.1: Pasianʼ mai le a hingte hitaleh a site hitaleh mi khempeuhʼ thu a khen ding Khris Jesuʼ mai ah nakpi takin ka hong hanthawn hi. Amah Kumpi-in hong paikikin ukna hong kipan ding ahih manin,
verses.2: hunhoih hunsia cih khen tuan loin Pasianʼ thu hilh ding na kin ngaihsut nading, lungduaina tawh miteʼ lungsim zo-in, mite taii-in, hanthawnin na hilh nadingin thu a hong pia ka hi hi.
verses.3: Mite in thuman a ngaih nop loh hun, amauteʼ deihna bek a zuih nop hun, amauteʼ zaknop thute bek a gen ding sia a cial thuahthuah hun hong tung ding hi.
verses.4: Amaute in thuman thutak ngai nuam nawn loin tangthu phuahtawm peuh ngaihsutpi-in nei ding uh hi.
verses.5: Ahi zongin nang na hih leh thu khempeuh ah na lungsim ki-ukin haksatnate na thuak inla, Pasianʼ thugen nasep semin, na nasepna ah maa na tun in.
verses.6: Kei ka hih leh Pasian biakna-in hong kipiak ding hun hong tung ta hi. Hih leitung nuntakna ka nusiat ding hun hi ta hi.
verses.7: Kidemna ah ka hat tawpin ka hih khin a, a mong dongin ka tai khin a, upna thu kho takin lenin ka zo khin hi.
verses.8: Thu a manin a khen Topa in tua Ni ciangin kei a hong piak ding thuman lukhu ahi gualzawhna thaman in tu-in kei hong ngak gige hi. Kei tung bekah a hong pia ding hi lo a, ama hong paikik ding itna tawh a ngakte khempeuh tungah zong a pia ding ahi hi.
verses.9: Kei kiangah na hong pai baih theih nadingin hong hanciam in.
verses.10: Demas in hih leitung thu kin zaw ahih manin kei hong nusia-in Thesalonika khua ah a pai hi. Kresen, Galatia gamah pai a, Titus, Dalmatia gamah pai hi.
verses.11: Luka bek kei kiangah om hi. Marka in nasepna ah nakpi takin hong huh thei ahih manin na hong pai ciangin amah hong tonpih in.
verses.12: Tikhikas ahihleh Efesa khua ah ka paisak khin hi.
verses.13: Na hong pai ciangin Troas khua ah Karpas kiang a ka nusiat ka puan tualpi hong pua inla, laibute zong, a diakdiakin savun laidalte tawh zong hong pua in.
verses.14: Sikseek pa Alexander in kei tungah siatna lianpi hong bawl hi. Ama gamtatna tawh kizui-in Topa in thuk ding hi.
verses.15: Amah in i thuhilhna nakpi takin nial ahih manin amah tawh kisai ah nangma pumpi kidawm mahmah in.
verses.16: Keimah kihut nading thu ka gen masak ni-in kuamah in hong kop pih loin hong taisan mang uh hi. Tua thu hangin mawhsakna thuak kei beek uh hen!
verses.17: Ahi zongin Topa in kei hong ompih a, Gentail mi khempeuh tungah Pasianʼ thu a kicingin ka gen theih nadingin thahatna a hong pia hi. Tua ahih manin sih nading thukhenna pan hong suaktasak hi.
verses.18: Topa in siatna khempeuh panin kei hong hon khia dinga, ama vantung gamah muanhuai takin hong tunpih ding hi. Amah in a tawntungin minthanna ngah tahen. Amen.
verses.19: Prisilla, Aquila le Onesiforas-te innkuan na hopihsak in.
verses.20: Erastas, Korin khua ah om lai hi. Trofimas, Miletas khua ah a cina-in ka nusia hi.
verses.21: Phalbi tun ma-in nong pai theih nadingin hong hanciam in. Eubulas, Pudens, Linas, Klaudias le i sanggam dangte khempeuh in zong hong hopih uh hi.
verses.22: Topa in nangmah hong ompih tahen. Note khempeuh tungah Pasianʼ hehpihna thupha hong tung tahen.
